devdoc.author: d1ll0n
devdoc.details: Contract for swapping undesired tokens to desired tokens for an index pool. This contract is deployed as a proxy for each index pool. When tokens are unbound from a pool, they are transferred to this contract and sold on UniSwap or to anyone who calls the contract in exchange for any token which is currently bound to its index pool and which has a desired weight about zero. It uses a short-term uniswap price oracle to price swaps and has a configurable premium rate which is used to decrease the expected output from a swap and to reward callers for triggering a sale. The contract does not track the tokens it has received in order to reduce gas spent by the pool contract. Tokens must be tracked via events, meaning this is not well suited for trades with other smart contracts.

params.tokenBought: Token received from caller and sent to pool

calcInGivenOut(address,address,uint256).details: Calculate the amount of `tokenIn` the pool will accept for `amountOut` of `tokenOut`.

calcOutGivenIn(address,address,uint256).details: Calculate the amount of `tokenOut` the pool will give for `amountIn` of `tokenIn`.

executeSwapExactTokensForTokens(address,.details: Executes a trade with UniSwap to sell some tokens held by the contract for some tokens desired by the pool and pays the caller any tokens received above the minimum acceptable output.

params.amountIn: Exact amount of `tokenIn` to give UniSwap

executeSwapTokensForExactTokens(address,.details: Execute a trade with UniSwap to sell some tokens held by the contract for some tokens desired by the pool and pays the caller the difference between the maximum input value and the actual paid amount.

params.amountOut: Exact amount of `tokenOut` to receive from UniSwap

initialize(address,uint8).details: Initialize the proxy contract with the acceptable premium rate and the address of the pool it is for.

setPremiumPercent(uint8).details: Set the premium rate as a percent.

swapExactTokensForTokens(address,address.details: Swap exactly `amountIn` of `tokenIn` for at least `minAmountOut` of `tokenOut`.

params.amountIn: Amount of `tokenIn` to sell to pool
params.minAmountOut: Minimum amount of `tokenOut` to buy from pool

swapTokensForExactTokens(address,address.details: Swap up to `maxAmountIn` of `tokenIn` for exactly `amountOut` of `tokenOut`.

params.amountOut: Amount of `tokenOut` to buy from pool
params.maxAmountIn: Maximum amount of `tokenIn` to sell to pool

devdoc.title: UnboundTokenSeller
